text: @SecPompeo The trump regime blocked scientists & medical experts from giving accurate info/testifying, undercut expert advice, & lied about test/supply availability while almost 70,000 Americans died. This is unacceptable during an ongoing threat & pandemic. You mad about that too? #COVID19
